alert.note: Alert for Allen; East Cameron; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 05 at 12:59PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN CAMERON...JEFFERSON DAVIS...EASTERN CALCASIEU AND SOUTHERN ALLEN PARISHES THROUGH 145 PM CST... At 1259 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Topsy to near Lake Charles Regional Airport to near Heberts Marina to near Cameron. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Cameron, Welsh, Iowa, Kinder, Elton, Fenton, Hayes, Lacassine National Wildlife Refuge, Lake Charles Regional Airport, Grand Chenier, Moss Bluff, Hacketts Corner, Topsy, Lebleu Settlement, Sweet Lake, Buller, Pine Island, Thornwell, and Creole. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 33 and 59. Interstate 210 between mile markers 8 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Allen; East Cameron; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis
